main_topic.author: VolodymyrBilyachat
main_topic.title: Is this competition limited to Gemma only?
main_topic.content:
I cant find in rules anything but am I allowed to use other LLM models than Gemma? Or anything as soon as it fits into 

Technical Specifications

100 GB of disk space

16 GB of RAM

1 T4 GPU ?

comments.author: Addison Howard
comments.content: Yes - you can use any LLM model you wish (that fits the constraints of submission)

comments.author: Kuldeep Rathore
comments.content:
We have a public notebook which is using Phi3

[https://www.kaggle.com/code/pawinchan/phi3-20-questions](url)
